org.openscience.cdk
Class MoleculeSet

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.cdk.ChemObject
      org.openscience.cdk.AtomContainerSet
          org.openscience.cdk.MoleculeSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, IAtomContainerSet, IChemObject, IChemObjectListener, IMoleculeSet
Direct Known Subclasses:
DebugMoleculeSet, NNMoleculeSet
public class MoleculeSet
extends AtomContainerSet
implements IMoleculeSet, java.lang.Cloneable

A set of molecules, for example those taking part in a reaction. To retrieve the molecules from the set, there are two options: 

 Molecule[] mols = setOfMolecules.getMolecules();
 for (int i=0; i < mols.length; i++) {
     Molecule mol = mols[i];
 }
and 
 for (int i=0; i < setOfMolecules.getMoleculeCount(); i++) {
    Molecule mol = setOfMolecules.getMolecule(i);
 }

See Also:
Serialized Form
Keywords:
reaction, molecule
Belongs to CDK module:
data
Source code:
